title: Share screen isn't working
body:
I'm using Ubuntu 24.04 LTS, share screen isn't working, it shows this error message.

![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/eff13b22-b7be-4ec6-b610-d37c7e9fb9d6)


However, Teams can access the camera and can start the video. Also sharing white board works fine. the problem is in sharing desktop window or some app screen.
